title: Riff Raff
notes: It's water frame can be found in a labeled drawer.
curation_notes:
STANDARD EUROPEAN BOARD GAME (PURPLE) SLEEVES
Components:
4 Orange Barrels
4 Grey Rats
4 Dark Blue Sailors
4 Green Crates
4 Red Vases
4 Light Blue Chests
4 Black Planks
4 Beige Lifeboats
1 Mast
3 Mast Pegs
3 Mast Arms
1 Metal Weight
1 Bottom Arm
1 Ring
2 Water Wave... frame thingys
40 player cards in 4 colours from 1 to 10.
Notes: The water wave thingy frame can be glued together and reinforced with wood (College has done this to prevent people ripping it apart) and stored separately in a drawer, generally unnecessary.  The Mast Arms, Rats and the Barrels are the most common things to go missing (Often cutting stirsticks or bar skewers is common replacement).  Recommend gluing the large metal ball to the bottom stick as it unscrews.
